PayApp Exceptions

exception payapp.custom_exceptions.CurrencyConversionError(message='Error in currency conversion, please try again')

Bases: Exception

Exception raised for errors in the currency conversion process.

exception payapp.custom_exceptions.InsufficientBalanceException(message='Insufficient balance to complete the transaction')

Bases: Exception

Exception raised when a user tries to accept a request but does not have enough balance.
